name: FishermanWeather
desc: This is a useful weather widget that shows forecast information. Fisherman can get current weather, and 3-hourly forecast 5 days for your location. Helpful stats, graphics for fisherman to obtain the data.
tech1: React front-end allowing users to gain weather information from open weather API.
tech2: It draws a fishing maps using Leaflet open-source libray with geoJSON data.
tech3: Using Recharts, it shows real-time Weather information include precipitation, clouds, temperature, wind, and more..

name: SeekMentor
desc: It is modern website using node.js, RESTful-api and postgreSQL with react framework on Express Server.
tech1: Client was created by React with Node.js with the responsible web design concept.
tech2: In server side, It used postgreSQL database with the Express server.
tech3: Convenient SMS text and email send functions make sure users always know others requests

name: Auckland Map
desc: GIS application allows people to connect places. Using various Plugins, I could draw diffrent style map and particular areas named polygon.
tech1: Frontend with HTML, CSS and JSX
tech2: Backend with design tables, express routes and postgreSQL.
tech3: TDD by Jest,postman and react/redux debug tools
